text: @GregAbbott_TX Texas has now earned an F for social distancing. https://t.co/VYD5O2YckH Additionally, the Governor is asserting the rights of others to put your health in jeopardy by choosing not to wear a face covering. If I weren't a death penalty opponent, I'd say prison is too good for them
